attributes.action: tougher punishments or even prison sentences for woman who falsely accuse males of rape
attributes.additional_details: Women who falsely accuse males of rape or indecent assault should serve prison sentences of no less than 12 months.A male who has been wrongly accused and who has had to go through the system becomes seriously mentally damaged and scarred for life as a result.there is no help or support for males who have been wrongly accused to build back a normal life.They are left with a strong Social stigma that will never leave them and it's about time the law was on the real victims side for a change.
